def_cn: 骑师;骑手;骑马(或自行车、摩托车)的人
def_en: A rider is someone who rides a horse, a bicycle, or a motorcycle as a hobby or job. You can also refer to someone who is riding a horse, a bicycle, or a motorcycle as a rider.
A rider is a statement that is added to another statement, especially one which contains a change, an explanation, or further information.
